example.parse: (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 城镇) (NN 职工)) (VP (ADVP (AD 再)) (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (ADVP (PP (P 象) (NP (NT 过去))) (ADVP (AD 那样))) (PU ，) (PP-DIR (P 从) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (PP-LOC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 工作)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 单位)))) (VP (VV 分得) (NP-OBJ (NN 住房)))))))
